title: Top lane curse confirmed
body:
I can play all roles.

HOWEVER, if I ever step foot into top lane, my entire team feeds. It's absolutely bizarre.

I know my top stats don't show domination, but I will always shit on my counterpart. For example, if I'm Pantheon, I will attract enemy Jungler and keep enemy Top laner to at least half my own CS.

But here is where the funny happens. Effectively, a 3v4 - because the enemy Jungler is constantly with me - my entire team just feeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeds.

Not lose lane a bit. Feeeeeeeeeeed.

By the time I've exited laning phase, I'm versing 2 other carries that are equally, if not more, fed than me.

replies.body:
Top lane meta my friend. I had once gotten fed 5-6 times in a row at top but lost due to the other 4 people in the enemy team getting free kills off of all the lanes except top. If you want to hard carry you need at least 2 people. It's quite difficult to carry games on your own now.

It's a meme, it sucks but what can you do...
Top lane basically has no impact on the game anymore, if you want to win play like jg or mid, roles that actually can carry 1v9
